DOC.brief_summary: Part I : Proof concept trial achieve normal venous pressure value different provocation maneuver healthy person Part II : Non invasive measurement venous pressure different provocation maneuver patient chronic venous disease
DOC.brief_title: Venous Pressure Measurement Great Saphenous Vein Using Controlled Compression Ultrasound Healthy Persons Patients With Chronic Venous Disease New Non Invasive Method Investigation Pathophysiology Primary Varicose Veins
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Part I : Healthy person without clinical sign venous disease , inform consent Part II : Patients chronic venous disease complete incompetence great saphenous vein ( Hach IV ) Informed consent Exclusion criterion : Part I : Clinical sign venous disease , former deep vein thrombosis ( DVT ) Part II : Former deep vein thrombosis , former vein surgery
